```{r setup}
library(tidyverse)
```


## Read in some data

Read in the litters data set.

```{r}
litters_df = read.csv("./data/FAS_litters.csv")
litters_df = janitor::clean_names(litters_df)
```

## Take a look at the data

Pringting in the console
```{r}
litters_df
```

```{r}
tail(litters_df)
```
```{r}
skimr::skim(litters_df)
```

## Options to raed_csv

```{r}
litters_df = read_csv("./data/FAS_litters.csv", na = c("", "NA", ".", 999))
# read_csv know there supposed to be missing values, and stored as "."
```

```{r}
litters_df = read_csv("./data/FAS_litters.csv", skip = 10, col_names = FALSE)
#skip the first 10 rows and rename the column name characters by default
```


check ou tread_csv for more info
